title: New: Max García Conover – Streetlights
content:
Max García Conover released one of last years most underrated records, in the form of Motorhome.

His storytelling ability really shines on every composition, most notably the heart-wrenchingly raw Fire On i295, and his latest track whilst sees a deviation in sound, is no less majestic. Described as being “about memory — the beautiful, tragic capacity we have for carrying around little remnants of ourselves”, it’s almost Springsteen-esque as points, yet soaked in an almost John Hughes sense of romanticism. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
